title: Volunteer Management System (Web)
description: A comprehensive web-based Volunteer Management System to streamline event management and volunteer engagement.

title: Efficient Volunteer Management (Mobile)
description: An Android application that extends the VMS with features like Leaderboard, Ratings, Dark Mode, and Real-Time Sync.

title: Smart Weather Station (IoT)
description: Developed a Smart Weather Station using ESP32 and Arduino to collect real-time weather data, including temperature, humidity, and air quality.
